description: Specifies the level of detection for potentially unwanted applications (PUAs). Windows Defender alerts you when potentially unwanted software is being downloaded or attempts to install itself on your computer.
name: PUAProtection

options.description: PUA Protection off. Windows Defender will not protect against potentially unwanted applications.
options.name: PUA Protection off. Windows Defender will not protect against potentially unwanted applications.
options.displayName: PUA Protection off. Windows Defender will not protect against potentially unwanted applications.

options.description: PUA Protection on. Detected items are blocked. They will show in history along with other threats.
options.name: PUA Protection on. Detected items are blocked. They will show in history along with other threats.
options.displayName: PUA Protection on. Detected items are blocked. They will show in history along with other threats.

options.description: Audit mode. Windows Defender will detect potentially unwanted applications, but take no action. You can review information about the applications Windows Defender would have taken action against by searching for events created by Windows Defender in the Event Viewer.
options.name: Audit mode. Windows Defender will detect potentially unwanted applications, but take no action. You can review information about the applications Windows Defender would have taken action against by searching for events created by Windows Defender in the Event Viewer.
options.displayName: Audit mode. Windows Defender will detect potentially unwanted applications, but take no action. You can review information about the applications Windows Defender would have taken action against by searching for events created by Windows Defender in the Event Viewer.
